channel.title: Posts on Youniverse
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Youniverse

item.title: Coursera | Machine Learning Specialisation (1/n)
item.description: Recently, I’m thinking of picking up machine learning and it maybe interesting to work on some toy projects, started working on the Machine Learning Specialisation on Coursera. To me, Prof. Andrew Ng’s Machine Learning course on Coursera is one of the go-to material to getting start with Machine Learning. This is my second time learning this course on Coursera, and the first time I did it, it was not yet a specialisation.

item.title: YAK8s 101: 1 | What is K8s? [Note]
item.description: What is K8s? | Kubernetes is a platform to orchestrate containers. It looks like this: ref: Kubernetes Documentation (Kubernetes Components). Accessed 8 Sep 2021, https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/overview/components/

item.title: Install Golang From Source
item.description: Why? When setting up a Golang working environment, broadly speaking, there are two ways: using a package manager/installer or installing from source. Most of the time it’s much easier to use a package manager or installer and by executing one or two commands, the entire working environment is ready to use. Well, this time, I just would like to see how manual installation works. Head Let me first list all the steps that I can think of for the installation:
